review: I love the service, however the remote leaves quite a lot to be desired.  The romote is forever freezing up and not changing on screen positions, and when it unlocks it hyper scrolls whatever direction I had sent it.  Unfortunately the Android app, does the same hyper scroll.  Overall I like the product.
author: Amazon Customer "The Shadow"

review: I bought this to watch the premium show 'Naked News' without having to use my computer and the internet.  Coincidentally, I am an Amazon Prime member so I can get Amazon Prime Video - TV Shows and Movies free and I can get all that via Roku.  I have watched all of 'Bosch' shows and am now on on my 4th season of 'The Good Wife'  - several episodes a night.  A very good product.  It's High Resolution (1080i) on an 8 foot wide picture projected by an Infocus Projector - a real Home Theater Experience - on a dime.  No screen needed - project on the wall or ceiling.
author: JED
